		                    Isolated Plasmacytoma of Bone
		                    Treatment of isolated plasmacytoma of bone is usually radiation therapy to the bone lesion.   Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with isolated plasmacytoma of bone. For more specific results, refine the search by using other search features, such as the location of the trial, the type of treatment, or the name of the drug. Tal
